SERVICE.name: returnoptions
SERVICE.COMMENT: This services routes the user to the various services available through the Return Options screen.

ROAD.name: CancelReturnCustomer
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traversed when the user cancels from customer

ROAD.name: OfflineReturnCustomer
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traversed when the system is offline. The user is brought to the return item station.

ROAD.name: InvalidReturnTransaction
ROAD.COMMENT: An invalid transaction is attempted to be returned.

ROAD.name: TooManyTransactionsToList
ROAD.COMMENT: Too many transactions were found. Return to the search options site.
